devotions.message:
8/11/2025
Good morning,
Proverbs 3:5-6 Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.

LESSON IDEA:
Trusting God completely means putting our full confidence in Him, even when we don't understand the path ahead. When we lean on our own understanding, we limit God's ability to guide us. Today, let's commit to acknowledging God in every decision and trusting His perfect direction for our lives.

Have a blessed day and may God bless you. TY.......
